p: Thank you for sending your work entitled “Mapping the zoonotic niche of Ebola virus disease in Africa” for consideration at eLife. Your article has been favorably evaluated by Prabhat Jha (Senior editor), who is overseeing the peer review of your article, three members of our Board of Reviewing Editors, and we have also received comments from five experts from outside of the Board of Reviewing Editors. Two of the reviewers, Pasi Penttinen and Alimuddin Zumla, have agreed to reveal their identity.
